document.docAuthor: Ho, Hsuan-Ching, Smith, David G., Tighe, Kenneth A., Hibino, Yusuke & Mccosker, John E.
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of eels of Taiwan (orders Anguilliformes and Saccopharyngiformes): An update

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of eels of Taiwan (orders Anguilliformes and Saccopharyngiformes): An update

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Ariosoma dolichopterum
Karmovskaya, 2015 :719
(Type locality: Coastal waters of Central Vietnam).
Smith et al. , 2018e
: this volume.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks. The species was identified as
Ariosoma anago
by previous authors (Chen & weng, 1967; Shen, 1998 ). Smith et al. (2018d) review the genus
Ariosoma
in Taiwan and verified its present identification.
